replies.bodyText:
The Stripe team that I got the code from identified that there were some 20/21 API devices which still didn't have the update. I think from the data that our audience of devices which are off KitKat but not on a significantly newer version is pretty small, so I figured I'd take their word for it.
I should add links to the sources, though, which will clarify where that info came from, thanks for catching.
